description: The site of Cartana/Karnasa/Tetrogonis remains unlocated, although scholars have advanced various theories as to its location.
details:
The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Bamiyan? AFG

Tarn suggested that Cartana be located at Bamiyan while Cunningham supported the theory that Cartana-Tetragonis should be located at Begram. Fraser refutes Cunningham's assertion based on archaeological evidence from Begram.
